Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the imposition of a surcharge of twenty-five cents on every online delivery sale within the city of New York
Summary: Imposes a surcharge of twenty-five cents on every online delivery sale where such delivery terminates within the city of New York; deposits funds into a special New York city infrastructure capital fund.
LawCode: Add Art 29-E §§1299-T - 1299-BB, Tax L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to a surcharge on online delivery sales in the city of New York
